title: "Advanced Topics"
format: html
---

The next chapters contains technical details on `sits` and are intended mainly for developers. It is intended to support those that want to understand how the package works and also want to contribute to its development. It includes general principles of `sits` software development, describes how parallel processing works. It shows how to support new STAC-based cloud collections and how to include new methods for machine learning in `sits`. It discusses how to export data to other packages and provides a comparison between SITS and Google Earth Engine.
